title: How do I configure the weather settings?
answer: [On the home screen, go to Weather. On the displayed screen, flick your finger left or right to view the weather of different cities.]()  To refresh the weather information, drop- down the screen..  To manage cities, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111741) in the upper right corner to delete or add a city or set the current location. Touch![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111742)>Setting, You can then set the temperature unit, whether tones are displayed, auto update, and update interval. ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111743)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111744) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111745)
